description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Imagine breakout, except this time the blocks aren't as happy about you firing balls in their directions and are fighting back! Collect power-ups to get back in the fight and juggle as many balls as you can to get extra points. Battle through 10 Levels of 3 stages each in arcade mode, take on survival mode, or play versus another player.
